__e: I mean, he can't talk about what he's doing. You know, it's a national-security thing, but, I don't know, I just... I miss talking.
Look, Val, I don't pretend to know what you're all about, but when people start throwing around words like "national security," there's not a lot I can do.
If there's something going on that I don't know about that involves national security, it is my business.
